mapper.insert: insert into course(id, teacher_id, subject_id, subject_parent_id, title, price, lesson_num, cover, buy_count, view_count, version, status, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values(#{id}, #{teacherId}, #{subjectId}, #{subjectParentId}, #{title}, #{price}, #{lessonNum}, #{cover}, #{buyCount}, #{viewCount}, #{version}, #{status}, #{isDeleted}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified})
